skills.name: Windrider Bullet
desc: Deals Wind DMG equal to **50%** of Bronya's ATK to a single enemy.
Deals Wind DMG equal to **60%** of Bronya's ATK to a single enemy.

Deals Wind DMG equal to **100%** of Bronya's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Combat Redeployment
desc:
Dispels a **debuff** from a single ally, allows them to immediately take action, and increases their DMG by **33%** for 1 turn(s).
When this Skill is used on Bronya herself, she cannot immediately take action again.

Dispels a **debuff** from a single ally, allows them to immediately take action, and increases their DMG by **36%** for 1 turn(s).
When this Skill is used on Bronya herself, she cannot immediately take action again.

skills.name: The Belobog March
desc: Increases the ATK of all allies by **33%**, and increases their CRIT DMG equal to **12.0%** of Bronya's CRIT DMG plus **12.0%** for 2 turn(s).
Increases the ATK of all allies by **35%**, and increases their CRIT DMG equal to **12.4%** of Bronya's CRIT DMG plus **12.8%** for 2 turn(s).
Increases the ATK of all allies by **37%**, and increases their CRIT DMG equal to **12.8%** of Bronya's CRIT DMG plus **13.6%** for 2 turn(s).
Increases the ATK of all allies by **40%**, and increases their CRIT DMG equal to **13.2%** of Bronya's CRIT DMG plus **14.4%** for 2 turn(s).
Increases the ATK of all allies by **42%**, and increases their CRIT DMG equal to **13.6%** of Bronya's CRIT DMG plus **15.2%** for 2 turn(s).
Increases the ATK of all allies by **44%**, and increases their CRIT DMG equal to **14.0%** of Bronya's CRIT DMG plus **16.0%** for 2 turn(s).
Increases the ATK of all allies by **47%**, and increases their CRIT DMG equal to **14.5%** of Bronya's CRIT DMG plus **17.0%** for 2 turn(s).
Increases the ATK of all allies by **50%**, and increases their CRIT DMG equal to **15.0%** of Bronya's CRIT DMG plus **18.0%** for 2 turn(s).

skills.name: Leading the Way
desc: After using her Basic ATK, Bronya's next action will be **Advanced Forward** by **15%**.
After using her Basic ATK, Bronya's next action will be **Advanced Forward** by **17%**.
After using her Basic ATK, Bronya's next action will be **Advanced Forward** by **18%**.
After using her Basic ATK, Bronya's next action will be **Advanced Forward** by **20%**.
After using her Basic ATK, Bronya's next action will be **Advanced Forward** by **21%**.
After using her Basic ATK, Bronya's next action will be **Advanced Forward** by **23%**.
After using her Basic ATK, Bronya's next action will be **Advanced Forward** by **24%**.
After using her Basic ATK, Bronya's next action will be **Advanced Forward** by **26%**.

skills.name: Banner of Command
desc: After using Bronya's Technique, at the start of the next battle, all allies' ATK increases by 15% for 2 turn(s).

eidolons.name: Hone Your Strength
eidolons.desc: When using Skill, there is a 50% fixed chance of recovering 1 Skill Point. This effect has a 1-turn cooldown.

eidolons.name: Quick March
eidolons.desc: When using Skill, the target ally's SPD increases by 30% after taking action, lasting for 1 turn.

eidolons.name: Bombardment
eidolons.desc:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: Take by Surprise
eidolons.desc: After an ally other than Bronya uses Basic ATK on an enemy with Wind Weakness, Bronya immediately launches a follow-up attack on the target, dealing Wind DMG equal to 80% of Bronya's Basic ATK DMG. This effect can only be triggered 1 time per turn.

eidolons.name: Unstoppable
eidolons.desc:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: Piercing Rainbow
eidolons.desc: The duration of the DMG Boost effect placed by the Skill on the target ally increases by 1 turn(s).

skillTree.name: Command
skillTree.desc: The CRIT Rate for Basic ATK increases to 100%.

skillTree.name: Battlefield
skillTree.desc: At the start of the battle, all allies' DEF increases by 20% for 2 turn(s).

skillTree.name: Military Might
skillTree.desc: When Bronya is on the field, all allies deal 10% more DMG.
